original_text: and he said to him, “Take these vessels, go and put them in the temple that is in Jerusalem, and let the house of God be rebuilt on its site.”
korean_text: 일러 말하되 너는 이 그릇들을 가지고 가서 예루살렘 성전에 두고 하나님의 전을 제자리에 건축하라 하매

sentences.original_text: go and put them in the temple that is in Jerusalem,
sentences.korean_translation: 가서 그것들을 예루살렘에 있는 성전에 두고,

sentences.original_text: and let the house of God be rebuilt
